title: Taric Is An Aspect- CONFIRMED!
body:
> Taunting an enemy Taric Taric
> Play sound
> AurelionSol.tauntTaric01
> "You're an Aspect? Let me guess - tackiness"
> 

I think this speaks for itself. {{champion:80}} Pantheon, {{champion:131}} Diana, {{champion:89}} Leona and, breaking news, {{champion:44}} Taric, are Aspects.
That's huge. I doubt that they'll keep the Mount Targon website on hold for a long time, so, I'm guessing that the Rework is coming in 6.7 or 6.8. 

Rito, thank you.
